segments.text: What is the most enjoyable part about your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think meeting people . There are people from all over the country , all over the world , all walks of life which is the most interesting part of my job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I work very long hours , ten hours a day is quite normal . And if something important comes up , I â€™ m often in the office until 8 or 9 in the evening .
segments.speaker: S2
